mapper.select: /* 제재 내역 조회 */ select l.lmt_cd as lmt_cd, l.mbr_cd as mbr_cd, dr.dt_cd as dt_cd, dt.dt_nm as dt_nm, l.dr_cd as dr_cd, dr.dr_nm as dr_nm, l.lmt_start_ymdt as lmt_start_ymdt, l.lmt_end_ymdt as lmt_end_ymdt, l.lmt_clear_ymdt as lmt_clear_ymdt, l.lmt_rmd_days as lmt_rmd_days, case when l.lmt_rmd_days = 0 then '제재종료' else '제재중' end as lmt_status from limits l left join declaration_reason dr on l.dr_cd = dr.dr_cd left join declaration_type dt on dt.dt_cd = dr.dt_cd order by l.lmt_start_ymdt;

/* 제재 타입 내역 조회 */ select lt.lt_cd as lt_cd, lt.lt_nm as lt_nm, lt.lt_expln as lt_expln, lt.stc_cd as stc_cd, sc.stc_nm as stc_nm, lt.lt_reg_adm_cd as lt_reg_adm_cd, lt.lt_reg_ymdt as lt_reg_ymdt, lt.lt_mdfcn_adm_cd as lt_mdfcn_adm_cd, lt.lt_mdfcn_ymdt as lt_mdfcn_ymdt from limits_type lt left join status_code sc on lt.stc_cd = sc.stc_cd order by lt.lt_reg_ymdt;
